allowClear.description: Values are allowed to be cleared.

animation.description: Whether to animate internal label changes.
animation.description_zh: 是否为内部标签变化添加动画。

changeOnSelect.description: Each time you make a selection, the value changes. If this parameter is set to true when multiple selections are performed, the parent-child relationship will be dislinked. (By default, the value will be updated only when the selection is complete)
changeOnSelect.description_zh: 每当选择的时候，值都会发生改变。多选时如果设置为true，会取消父子关系的关联。(默认只有在选择完成的时候，值才会更新)

defaultActiveFirstOption.description: Whether to highlight the first option in search results by default.
defaultActiveFirstOption.description_zh: 是否默认高亮搜索结果第一个选项。

defaultPopupVisible.description: The default drop-down box is expanded and collapsed
defaultPopupVisible.description_zh: 默认下拉框的展开收起状态

dragToSort.description: Whether tags can be sorted by dragging
dragToSort.description_zh: 是否可以通过拖拽为 Tag 排序

error.description: Whether it is an error state. (Deprecated, removed in the next major version, replaced with status='error')
error.description_zh: 是否是错误状态。(废弃，下个大版本移除，使用 status='error' 替代)

:popupVisible.description: Controls the expansion and collapse of the drop-down box
:popupVisible.description_zh: 控制下拉框的展开收起

showEmptyChildren.description: Whether to render the next node when the selected children is [] when it is not dynamically loaded.
showEmptyChildren.description_zh: 是否在非动态加载时，选中项children为[]的时候渲染下一级节点。

unmountOnExit.description: Whether to destroy the DOM structure after hiding, defaults to true. If it is dynamically loaded, it is set to false by default.
unmountOnExit.description_zh: 是否在隐藏之后销毁DOM结构，默认为 true。如果是动态加载时，默认为false。

inputValue.description: Enter a value for the field

placeholder.description: The selection box defaults to text.

autoWidth.description: Set width adaptive. minWidth defaults to 0 and maxWidth defaults to 100%
autoWidth.description_zh: 设置宽度自适应。minWidth 默认为 0，maxWidth 默认为 100%

checkedStrategy.description: Customized backfill method parent: Returns the parent node when all child nodes are selected child: Returns the child node
checkedStrategy.description_zh: 定制回填方式  parent: 子节点都被选中时候返回父节点  child: 返回子节点

showSearch.type: | boolean| {panelMode?: 'cascader' | 'select';renderOption?: (inputValue: string, option: NodeProps<T>) => ReactNode;retainInputValue?: boolean;retainInputValueWhileSelect?: boolean;}
showSearch.description: To make the single-select mode searchable, pass in { retainInputValue: true } to preserve existing content when the search box is focused, pass in { retainInputValueWhileSelect: true } to preserve the input box content when multi-select is selected. Pass in { panelMode: 'select' } to display the options in the form of a search panel (2.39.0)renderOption (2.39.0)
showSearch.description_zh: 使单选模式可搜索，传入 { retainInputValue: true } 在搜索框聚焦时保留现有内容传入 { retainInputValueWhileSelect: true } 在多选选择时保留输入框内容。传入 { panelMode: 'select' } 以搜索面板形式展示可选项 (2.39.0)renderOption 自定义渲染搜索项 (2.39.0)

size.description: Selectors for different sizes. Corresponding to 24px, 28px, 32px, 36px
size.description_zh: 分别不同尺寸的选择器。对应 24px, 28px, 32px, 36px

:virtualListProps.description: Pass the virtual scroll property. When virtual scrolling is enabled, there is a default width for each column of the cascading menu, which can be adjusted by dropdownMenuColumnStyle
:virtualListProps.description_zh: 传递虚拟滚动属性。开启虚拟滚动后，每列级联菜单的会存在默认宽度，可通过 dropdownMenuColumnStyle 进行样式调整

:addBefore.description: Add an element before the selection box

:clearIcon.description: allowClear when configuring the icon for the Clear button.
:clearIcon.description_zh: allowClear 时配置清除按钮的图标。

:notFoundContent.description: What is displayed when there is no data
:notFoundContent.description_zh: 没有数据时显示的内容

:suffixIcon.description: Customize the selection box suffix icon.
:suffixIcon.description_zh: 自定义选择框后缀图标。

:arrowIcon.description: Custom arrow icon, set to null not to show arrow icon.
:arrowIcon.description_zh: 自定义箭头图标，设置为 null 不显示箭头图标。

:defaultValue.description: The default value for the selection box

dropdownMenuClassName.description: Customize the drop-down list class name

:fieldNames.description: Specify the label, value, isLeaf, disabled, and children fields

:filterOption.description: The default search is a keyword search from the label attribute. This method allows you to customize the search logic
:filterOption.description_zh: 默认搜索从 label 属性中进行关键字搜索。通过该方法可以自定义搜索逻辑

:loadMore.description: Load data dynamically. pathValue: The path value of the currently selected item; level: The level of the selected item.
:loadMore.description_zh: 动态加载数据。pathValue: 当前选中项的路径 value； level: 选中项层级。

:removeIcon.description: Configure the delete icon for the selected item when you select it multiple times. When null is passed, the delete icon is not displayed.
:removeIcon.description_zh: 多选时配置选中项的删除图标。当传入null，不显示删除图标。

:renderFooter.description: Define the footer for each tier. Parameters: level: current level, activeOption: currently clicked node. Returns null and does not show
:renderFooter.description_zh: 定义每一层级的 footer。参数：level: 当前层级, activeOption: 当前点击的节点。返回 null 不展示

:triggerProps.description: Props for all trigger components can be accepted
:triggerProps.description_zh: 可以接受所有 Trigger 组件的 Props

:dropdownColumnRender.description: Customize the display of each column of the drop-down menu.
:dropdownColumnRender.description_zh: 自定义下拉菜单每一列的展示。

dropdownRender.description: Customize the presentation of drop-down menus.
dropdownRender.description_zh: 自定义下拉菜单的展示。

:getPopupContainer.description: The pop-up box hangs on the parent node

:maxTagCount.description: The maximum number of tags to display, only valid in multi-select or tag mode.
:maxTagCount.description_zh: 最多显示多少个 tag，仅在多选或标签模式有效。

:renderTag.type: (props: {value: any;label: ReactNode;closable: boolean;onClose: (event) => void;},index: number,values: ObjectValueType[]) => ReactNode
:renderTag.description: Custom label rendering, props is the current tag property, index is the order of the current tag, and values is the value of all tags.
:renderTag.description_zh: 自定义标签渲染，props 为当前标签属性，index 为当前标签的顺序，values 为所有标签的值.

events.name: onChange
events.description: Click the callback in the selection box.

events.name: onClear
events.description: Triggered when you click Clear, the parameter is the expansion status of the current drop-down box.
events.description_zh: 点击清除时触发，参数是当前下拉框的展开状态。

events.name: onClick
events.description: Callback when the mouse clicks the drop-down box
events.description_zh: 鼠标点击下拉框时的回调

events.name: onKeyDown
events.description: Callbacks when typing on the keyboard

events.name: onVisibleChange
events.description: Triggered when the drop-down box is collapsed and expanded.
events.description_zh: 下拉框收起展开时触发。
